name: ManPlay
tag_list: gay, gay-dating, dating-site, dating-sites, online-dating, gay-men
overview:
Gay men are partly responsible for the online dating boom and more and more dating sites geared towards gay men are constantly popping up. The man who makes a careful choice is the one that decides on ManPlay for his dating needs. ManPlay is a site with a difference; one that actually cares about the satisfaction of its members,

ManPlay is renowned as the #1 top dating site for gay men. The Online Dating Council voted it the best dating site particularly for gay men. While there are tons of dating sites that will have sections for gay men to find others, they aren’t going to offer the same precision and attention to detail that a site that is tailored only for gay men. Plenty of dating sites that feature services for gay men aren’t really familiar with the unique needs and desires of the community; ManPlay is different. They know what are the features that gay men want and they make sure that the site is as fast and easy to use as possible. ManPlay understands that their members want to get connected to as many hot guys as possible in as little time as possible, so they have a streamlined process that makes it easier than ever to get signed up and registered as a member.
